description:
This course will show you how you can sell websites to clients by retailing design. It is common to hear cases in our industry where clients have no clue about what they want, designers may get frustrated and overwhelmed dealing with multiple beyond-expectation requests and unrealistic design deliverables. This course will help you deal with those issues, you will learn to propose, quote, present, design and sell websites that are prepacked in a way that are straightforward to manage and to implement.

Learn how to put together web projects quickly while keeping high design and usability standards. Learn ways to have a stock inventory of designs that you can simply re adapt and re-purpose for your client. The course includes examples of the best designs available and a practical hands-on tutorial in web site curation, retailing, quotations, content inventory and invoicing.

As we go through the course, you'll have access to live documents, libraries, downloads, try out sample exercises and view demonstrations of methods that you can then apply to your case or problem.
title: Mastering website sales and rapid prototyping
